entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 06:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
